name: Custom PSNP Theme
description: This is a custom theme for psnprofiles. I'm uploading it so that I can use it on my phone as well. Feel free to use it, build upon it, or share it.
additional_info:
Change log

Version 1.61:
Changed the color scheme from purple to blue. 

Version 1.6:
Adjusted colors on the highcharts on the /stats page for easier viewing

Version 1:
basic release
